recipesJson.name: Hippo Sauce
recipesJson.author: Nickevz
recipesJson.description:
Alright Alright Alright... where’ve I been? Well... creating this of course :) 

Strawberry Custard Cream - The Best Yet 😏

This is a strawberry cream swirled in vanilla custard.

The strawberry element comes from VT strawberry milk and WF juicy, the strawberry milk runs through the back while the juicy just pops the strawberry helping out the non strawberry tasters, I don’t usually have a problem tasting strawberries but when you have like 40+ mixes all strawberry and cream you can’t help but get muted, anyway, legendary custard is a bit of both as far as the cream and Custard aspect goes, it’s rich but at the same time so creamy that you can’t really decipher where it sits so I had to use it here, it also sits separate from the FA premium which I’ve used here as the custard element... the sugar cookie blends into the custard also helping decipher between the custard and the cream element, it doesn’t really matter what job it does though because let’s be fair, it’s me and I love sugar cookie 😏 I have 3 strawberry and cream/milk/custard recipes pretty much ready to be released but this ones really ticking the boxes for me today so it gets released first, Is it the best? You decide! I’ve got balls but I haven’t got the balls to claim this is the be all and end all of all strawberry cream profiles... is it good though? Hell yeah.

If you like this recipe and what I do then please rate and review accordingly.

*disclaimer - I am not responsible for any flavours being out of stock if you choose to try and go shopping for these concentrates 😆*
